name: personal-history-archive
description: A server and browser extension for saving a personal archive
author: Ian Bicking <ian@ianbicking.org>

scripts.start: npm run build:dev && web-ext run -f ${FIREFOX:-nightly} -s dev-data/extension/ --keep-profile-changes --firefox-profile dev-data/Profile --browser-console
scripts.build:dev: mkdir -p dev-data && .venv/bin/python -m pha.saver --script-location dev-data/pha-saver-script.py --native-name pha.saver.dev dev-data/ && NATIVE_SCRIPT=pha.saver.dev LOG_LEVEL=debug SERVER_LOG_LEVEL=debug TESTING_BROWSER=1 DEST=dev-data npm run build:ext && mkdir -p dev-data/Profile
scripts.build:zip: web-ext build --source-dir ${DEST:-build}/extension/ --ignore-files '**/README.md' --ignore-files '**/*.template' --overwrite-dest && mv web-ext-artifacts/personal_history_saver*.zip ${DEST:-build}/extension.zip && rmdir web-ext-artifacts || true
scripts.build:ext: mkdir -p ${DEST:-build} && cp -r extension/ ${DEST:-build}/extension && mkdir -p ${DEST:-build}/extension/build && .venv/bin/python python/pha/sub-env-vars.py < extension/buildSettings.js.tmpl > ${DEST:-build}/extension/build/buildSettings.js
scripts.test: npm run test:build-data && npm run test:build-ext && npm run test:selenium
scripts.test:build-ext: NATIVE_SCRIPT=pha.saver.test IDLE_WAIT_TIME=0 HISTORY_PAUSE=0 LOG_LEVEL=debug SERVER_LOG_LEVEL=debug TESTING_BROWSER=1 DEST=test/build/ npm run build:ext && DEST=test/build/ npm run build:zip && .venv/bin/python -m pha.saver --script-location test/test-data/pha-saver-script.py --native-name pha.saver.test test/test-data/
scripts.postinstall: if [[ ! -e .venv ]] ; then python3 -m venv .venv ; .venv/bin/python -m ensurepip ; fi && .venv/bin/pip install --upgrade pip && .venv/bin/pip install flake8 -e python/ && mkdir -p data && .venv/bin/python -m pha.saver data/ && npm run build:ext
scripts.jupyter: BASE="$(pwd)" ; if [[ ! -e .venv/bin/jupyter ]] ; then echo 'Installing prerequisites...' ; .venv/bin/pip install -r python/requirements.txt ; fi && export PHA_DATA="$(python -c 'import os, sys; print(os.path.abspath(sys.argv[1]))' ${PHA_DATA:-data})" && mkdir -p $PHA_DATA/notebooks ; if [[ ! -e $PHA_DATA/notebooks/template.ipynb ]] ; then cp python/template.ipynb $PHA_DATA/notebooks/ ; fi ; cd $PHA_DATA/notebooks && $BASE/.venv/bin/jupyter notebook
